mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, nickname, auth_provider, user_role, is_active, is_verified, email_verified, email_verified_at, birth_date, university_id, major_id) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{authProvider}::auth_provider, 'USER'::user_role, true, false, #{emailVerified}, #{emailVerifiedAt}, #{birthDate}, #{universityId}, #{majorId})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET email_verified = #{emailVerified}, email_verified_at = #{emailVerifiedAt}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE users SET birth_date = #{birthDate}, updated_at = now() WHERE id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM users WHERE email_verified = false AND created_at < #{threshold} AND auth_provider = 'EMAIL'
